jobInfo.postDescription:
岗位职责：
•	Familiar with the management procedures of laboratory work and carry out laboratory related work in accordance with ISO 17025 and company policies.
•	Mainly responsible for the testing of kitchen and household products, and complete various testing tasks. Fill in the datasheet as required, and record and report the abnormal situation.
•	Responsible for the maintenance, calibration and verification of laboratory instruments and equipment, and assist in CNAS audit.
•	Familiar with ISO 17025 and CNAS accreditation regulations, laboratory construction and laboratory capacity development.
•	Assisting client in product quality improvement.
•	熟悉实验室工作的管理规程，按照ISO 17025及公司政策进行实验室相关工作。
•	主要负责厨房家用产品检测工作，完成各项检测任务。按要求填写原始记录数据并对异常情况进行记录、汇报。
•	负责实验室仪器设备维护校准及期间核查工作，协助CNAS审核工作。
•	熟悉ISO 17025及CNAS认可条例，进行实验室建设及实验室能力开发工作。
•	负责对接客户需求，协助客户进行产品质量提升工作。
任职要求：
•	Minimum education: colleague degree or above majoring in mechanical or engineering or Vocational training in specific field.
•	Minimum professional experience: At least 1 years of related or similar working experience.
•	Specialty Know how: Skilled in reading and writing English, and office software/Good communication skill/Good team player with positive working attitude/Skilled in manual procedures in the field of testing and test equipment operation.
•	本科及以上学历，机械，物理及工程相关专业
•	1年以上进出口或第三方机构相关工作经验
•	英语能力良好，能够使用办公软件，良好的沟通能力及团队合作精神，工作态度积极
jobInfo.address: 深圳南山区莱茵技术监护(深圳)有限公司南山检测中心科技北二路16号赛霸电子1号楼3层

brandComInfo.introduce:
关于德国莱茵TÜV大中华区

德国莱茵TÜV集团作为国际知名的独立第三方检验、 检测和认证机构， 拥有超过140年的经验，在全球五大洲69 个国家设有500家分支机构， 全球员工数超过19,600， 能提供全球客户所需的专业服务支持。 德国莱茵TÜV大中华区员工约 3,800 人，服务范围包含工业及能源服务、电子电气产品测试、通讯测试、消费品测试、人体工学评估、交通服务、轨道系统安全、绿色产品认证、莱茵学院与生命关怀及管理体系等检验认证服务。
德国莱茵TÜV 向来以严谨高质量的测试认证服务著称，并以公正独立的角度提供各项专业评估，为当地企业提供符合安全、质量以及环保的优质服务和解决方案。
www.tuv.com

About TÜV Rheinland Greater China 

An internationally renowned independent third-party testing, inspection and
certification organization, TÜV Rheinland possesses more than 140 years of experience, has 500 service locations in 69 countries on 5 continents, employs over 19,600 people worldwide, and provides professional service support to clients around the world. TÜV Rheinland employs approximately 3,800 people in the Greater China region, offering testing and certification services such as industrial and renewable energy services, electrical and electronic product testing, telecom testing,
fast-moving consumer products testing, ergonomics evaluation, mobility, railway safety, green solutions, academy & life care and management system. TÜV Rheinland has long been synonymous with rigorous
high-quality testing and certification services and for providing a variety of
professional assessments from an impartial and independent perspective. We
provide local companies with quality services and solutions that comply with
safety, quality, and environmental-friendly requirements. 

www.tuv.com
